title: Devourers Visual Bug
body:
So my friend bought devourers, then after clicking him and checking his buffs, it shows he has 480 stacks. This disappeared after obtaining a stack. My the friends also reported seeing this in the same game.

Not game changing, but just think it's something that should be noted.

replies.body:
>420 stacks would have been worth not fixing

This is just a funny visual bug. I'd rather they keep it, honestly.
